def hash_prof_id(prof_id, stage, len=15):

hash_text = prof_id + f'supersecret_stage-{stage}'

full_hash = hashlib.sha256(hash_text.encode()).hexdigest()

return HASH_INTROS[stage] + full_hash[:len-3] # truncate
